metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3179 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
The processRequest function in minissdpd.c in MiniSSDPd 1.2.20130907-3 allows local users to cause a denial of service (invalid free and daemon crash) via vectors related to error handling.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

minissdpd - 1.1.20120121-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minissdpd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.20120121-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
